Author: _leastofthese_
Text: Hey I’m with you. I started purging again 2 weeks ago for the first time in 6 years. I was super disappointed in myself and felt a lot of shame. We do know better, and that makes us feel bad, but it’s a mental illness, and we do things we know better than.   Basically: YOU ARE NOT BAD. You are good and worthy! I hope you take it as a one time slip up and let it shake you back into better behaviors ❤️
